meanings.definition: Having a certain height or physical size.
meanings.sent1: The statured tree towered over the others in the forest.
meanings.sent2: She admired the statured mountains in the distance.
meanings.sent3: The statured giraffe tried to hide among the shorter animals.
meanings.sent4: His statured presence commanded attention in the room.
meanings.sent5: The statured oak tree stood proudly in the park.

meanings.definition: Having a certain level of importance or reputation.
meanings.sent1: The statured professor was well-respected by all the students.
meanings.sent2: Her statured position in the company gave her authority.
meanings.sent3: The statured actor played a silly role in the comedy movie.
meanings.sent4: His statured name echoed through the halls of history.
meanings.sent5: The statured leader inspired confidence in the team.
